entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind north 30 km/h. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
